message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product. I think it would be incredibly valuable for you. I'm initially offering it at $20,000. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but $20,000 is a bit steep for me. I'm willing to pay $12,000 for it. Can you consider my offer?
Bob, I appreciate your interest.  While I value your offer, $20,000 is closer to my bottom line for this product. Could you meet me halfway at $16,000?
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $16,000 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to go up to $14,000. Can you meet me there?
